text:
At the center of the festival grounds, near the stage, 'upbeat' music was playing.
There, many 'Transients' were now moving to the rhythm—
I went empty-headed into this section, so please forgive me if it's hard to understand

name: Tsukuyomi
text:
1, 2, Shakiin! Parapara! Parapara~!
Fufu, what do you think?

name: Tsukuyomi
text:
I'm dancing with the Diagonal Up/Down
choreography my sibling taught me~?

name: Tianzun
text:
You're not quite bad yourself! Though, as Asakusa's party-animal
teacher, I can't afford to lose. Feast your eyes, the side-swaying
steps and hip-work, polished in the clubs by 'yours truly'!

name: Barong
text:
I can't lose as a professional show dancer, can I?
I'll show you the 'Dance for Two' I've been making
go viral with my 'cute junior' from the 'guild'!

name: Color Gang
text:
W-Wow, everyone's styles are different,
but their dancing is super good~!

name: Ame no Uzume
text:
Wait, no way! Isn't that the dance I taught that kid...
He's acting so friendly with his little brothers? I'm actually feeling a bit jealous?

name: Ame no Uzume
text:
Hey everyone, move according to my lead!
I'm just the field coach, since it's the Ikebukuro Group that's actually competing?

name: Color Gang
text:
I-I know that. But, just looking at the coach
makes me dance naturally, and my body won't stop—!?

name: Sarutahiko
text:
Uwaa, are those kids okay?
That's some spartan training that doesn't fit the upbeat mood.

name: Sarutahiko
text:
Even Barong is here. I'm glad I didn't enter with my bubble dance.
With the synergy of those two, they'd probably dance on forever...

Representatives from each group dance on the stage,
while group members and general guests form circles around them to dance—
It's not a Bon Odori, but rather, a 'Holy Night Dance'.

note:
盆踊り (bon odori): a traditional dance (odori) performed
during Obon / Bon (a festival in Japan with Buddhist customs)

options.text: A Bon Odori at a winter festival!?

name: Jagannath
text:
Oho, this reminds me of the 'Rasa Lila' of my home!
Dancing in a circle in just the same way, how nostalgic.

Rasa Lila: part of the traditional story of Krishna (major deity in Hinduism),
where he dances with gopis (cowherd girls)
'rasa' means aesthetics, 'lila' means act / play

name: Jagannath
text:
Alright, do I show off some flashy dancing too?
[Player], you play the role of the 'cowherd', then dance with me!

note: Odissi: major ancient Indian classical dance, originated in the Hindu temples of Odisha

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Heheh, naturally.
Believe it or not, I'm a master of 'Odissi'.
Just leave both of your hands to me.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ame no Uzume
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Eh, wow! You didn't even need my help, did you?
You could've easily gotten the crowd going as the coach yourself!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oho, is that how it is?
Well then, let's see what you can do!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ame no Uzume
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Eh, wow! You didn't even need my help, did you?
You guys could've easily gotten the crowd going as the coach yourself!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Heheh, just leave both of your hands to me.
Believe it or not, I'm a master of 'Odissi'.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ame no Uzume
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Eh, wow! You didn't even need my help, did you?
You could've easily gotten the crowd going as the coach yourself!

name: Jagannath
text:
'Thank you'~! But you see, the sense of security from being
guided by a cool pro in the field is important for those kids.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Uncle won't lose to that Tsukuyomi!
Belly dancing is Uncle's specialty!

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Mmm, mimicking the teacher's movements and shaking my hips...
Like I can do such a strange movement—!!

name: Jinn
text:
Dancing together with my beloved students!
If we're gonna dance anyway, we might as well go all out, right, [Player]!?

Caught up in the heat of the dancers, the tempo of the
music increases, eventually turning into something of a battle of endurance.

name: Barong
text:
Now, everyone, keep up with me until the very end!
Now is the time to show your spirit and guts!!

name: Nobuharu
text:
Ossu! Shibamata Spirit! I can't let myself give up before Barong-senpai,
who's been showing us such an incredible 'performance'!

name: Color Gang's Members
text:
D-Dammit, we're at our physical limit—!
Wait, aren't those Shibamata dancers getting even more energetic!?

name: Ame no Uzume
text:
Ahaha, let's wrap it up for the 'Ikebukuro Group', shall we?
If we keep going, they might go 'unconscious' for the rest of the festival~

name: Ame no Uzume
text:
Nice fight, you guys!
Let's dance together again sometime, keeping it upbeat!!

name: Host
text:
And the result—
In this "Holy Night Dance Showdown" where every group gave their all,
after a strict judging, the winner is the Shibamata Group led by Barong—!!

name: Color Gang's Members
text:
Dammit, we lost—!!
But... Even though it's frustrating, we gave it our all, didn't we?

name: Baphomet
text:
Great work, you really did well. The results of the 'judges'
are just for show, for you are all perfect scores to me.

name: Color Gang
text:
—Heh. Thank you for coming to watch us.
I really feel fired up when you're watching, Baphomet.

name: Baphomet
text:
Oh my, fufu... I suppose we should also thank Jack-sama and the others.
It is much easier for me to come, now that I do not have to worry about the 'base'.

name: Color Gang
text:
Right. The production of the Deco-Float decorations is moving along fast,
and we're doing even more than we planned. We're feeling great!!

The delinquent cop duo watches this
heartwarming exchange from a short distance away.

options.text: Talking about reforming, they've pretty much got it, haven't they?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hey, you call yourself my buddy while you're that pathetic?
You've gotta be able to stick with me through the whole night.

options.text: Jagan, you can do just about anything, can't you?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh? Was I really that cool?
Heheh, if you're like that already, your heart won't hold out when we become real buddies.

text:
As Baphomet returns to [Player] and the others,
she puffed out her chest, speaking with unmistakable pride.

name: Baphomet
text:
Fufu, I have proven once again that my 'children' are the cutest, have I not?
They are just 'exceptionally good kids' who happen to harbor many complex devils!

name: Baphomet
text:
—That being said, it is a fact that they have not atoned for their crimes.
We must move to the next step in the near future, must we not?

Suddenly draped in a faint melancholy,
Baphomet gently bit her shapely lips.

name: Baphomet
text:
But— I want them to have a little more time before that.
I want to give them the experience of success, having accomplished something together.

name: Baphomet
text:
While it is a fact that they are responsible,
I do not want to let that opportunity be taken away from them midway.

name: Baphomet
text:
...Shamefully, this is
entirely my own selfishness...

options.text: I'd like to let them do that if possible, but...

name: Jagannath
text:
Yeah, I feel the same. Or rather,
that's what I've been thinking of from the 'start'.

name: Jagannath
text:
There's no avoiding punishment for the crimes they've committed.
This 'next step' will naturally be full of hardships.

name: Jagannath
text:
Those who were scattered will surely feel like 'giving up' again.
That's why we need to create memories and bonds to support them then.

name: Baphomet
text:
...If I may ask?
Is that, an idea based on your own experience, Jagannath-sama?

name: Jagannath
text:
I suppose so. Back when I was a child, memories of stea—
savoring butter with my friends saved me more times than I can count.

name: Jagannath
text:
They're precious memories from a time when I wasn't
carrying anything, and I could be on equal terms with anyone.

dialogue_after_selection.text:
When their eyes meet, he raises the corners of his mouth defiantly, as usual.
However, there seemed to be something hidden deep within that smile.

options.text: Is that why you're siding with the delinquents?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text: ...Well, I can't say it in one word, but I can say that 'all my experiences lead to who I am now'.

An answer came briefly after a short pause.
The mood in the air felt as if he was trying to evade the question.

options.text: Is that why you're buddies with me?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Maybe?
Doing something big alone is no fun, right?

An answer came briefly after a short pause.
The mood in the air felt as if he was trying to evade the question.

name: Jagannath
text:
Now then. Anyway, for the next step,
there are mainly two things we need to do. First—

name: Color Gang
text:
But with this, our overall victory is gone...
The group that performed the best wins, but we have won none of the three events so far.

name: Color Gang
text:
And the fourth program—
We 'can't' participate in the 'Tag Match' this afternoon if we aren't part of a school.

I hate that they confirm that 喧嘩興行 means Tag Match this late into the story
I spent the first 4 chapters thinking it was Brawl Performance,
and then I continued naming it Brawl Performance out of habit
thank you Ctrl+Shift+H

Pure fistfighting without using 'Sacred Artifacts' is extremely dangerous—
Therefore, the rules stated that no one without a 'clear affiliation' was allowed to participate.

A complex frustration seeps into the boys' voices and expressions as they
face the reality of being unable to participate due to having dropped out.

name: Color Gang
text:
...We could ask our assistants to help again, but if we make those
two our representatives, it won't really feel like our own team.

name: Color Gang
text:
Baphomet is set to participate as 'staff', and Kirito says that
'I'm weaker than you guys, so it's out of the question'...

name: Baphomet
text:
Children, I am very sorry... During the meeting at the pre-festival,
everyone seemed to be in trouble because the commentator canceled.

name: Baphomet
text:
And like so, I told them that I have an 'Rule' well-versed
in various fields of knowledge. I also wanted to repay everyone's kindness...

Something damp mixes into the dry winter air.
But, the next brisk voice blows it away.

name: Jagannath
text:
Oh, if that's the case, then what
if I became your representative instead?

name: Color Gang's Members
text: <p2 style="font-size: 140%">—Ehhhhh!?

name: Jagannath
text:
Heheh. This is the first thing we need to do—
Full backup for you brats in the Fighting Festival!

A sudden bewilderment spreads, and the children start buzzing.
However, that reaction contained a certain expectation and excitement.

name: Jagannath
text:
Half of me is a cop, other half's a mixed martial artist.
I always have two positions being a switch fighter?

name: Color Gang
text:
—!! Then, could the other
representative possibly be [Player]...?

Glittering eyes concentrate on [Player] all at once.
And it was immediately after that, that a voice as sharp as the freezing winter was heard.

—No.
That, at least, is absolutely forbidden.

name: Baphomet
text:
...This police officer over here seems to have
a clearly different viewpoint from Hogen-sama.

The uniform as a symbol of the police's power, and its intimidating presence—
Baphomet steps forward, wanting to 'protect' the frozen children.

Directing a sharp eye at that symbolic sight,
the black tiger delinquent cop muttered silently.

name: Jagannath
text:
(Ah, so this is how it's gonna be?
Sure reminds me of the time before the Kurukshetra War started.)

Jagannath takes a deep, steady breath. In an instant,
his sharp expression softens, and he speaks with a casual, easy-going tone.

name: Jagannath
text:
Hey, Toji. Unlike Tajikarao and Magami,
you're actually here as a police officer, aren't you?

name: Jagannath
text:
I should've told you to leave the scene to me.
Even that geezer Hogen would have acknowledged that.

name: Toji
text:
This is a direct order from an even higher authority, Chief Daikoku himself.
I am to inspect the scene today and report back.

name: Toji
text:
I will notify you in advance that, depending on the situation,
the authority to direct the investigation of this case may be transferred to me.

name: Jagannath
text:
...Oh, is that so? And—
What's the reason why this fella isn't allowed in?

name: Toji
text:
[Player] is merely on temporary loan from Shinjuku Academy.
Their participation in these dangerous 'events' is not permitted.

name: Toji
text:
Now, with the culprits of the Black Santa attack present—
It is even more impermissable to become their representatives.

name: Toji
text:
The same should originally apply
to you as a police officer, Jagannath.

name: Toji
text:
...This is not a matter of convenience or pretense.
Know that depending on the case, you could also fall into a disadvantageous position.

name: Toji
text:
But even so, you're on Jagannath's side...
No, this is merely a personal feeling, so I shall refrain.

name: Toji
text:
Anyway, I shall only observe you. And, I intend
to report things as they are— Do excuse me.

As Toji leaves the area without hesitation,
Jagannath tosses a light remark at his upright back.

name: Jagannath
text:
Oh, I see. Thanks for going out of your way to tell me.
Do look forward to the excitement of the Tag Match!

name: Color Gang
text:
...I really don't like the police.
Arrogant, one-sided, and doesn't bother listening.

name: Color Gang
text:
Exactly. It would be nice if all the
police were like Jagannath and [Player]...

Immediately after, Jagannath pointed it
out with a sharp word of assertion.

name: Jagannath
text:
No, that's not right.
I could even say that's completely wrong.

name: Color Gang
text:
—Eh?
W-Why?

name: Jagannath
text:
It's because of proper people like him that I exist.
If everyone were like me, the entire organization would collapse.

name: Jagannath
text:
—Well, [Player]'s existence might be different, but
even so, they probably aren't an orthodox person either.

name: Color Gang
text:
...I get what you're saying.
But Jagannath, doesn't that mean you and [Player] should stop getting involved with us?

name: Color Gang
text:
Yeah. In the first place, since [Player] can't participate,
there's nothing that can be done about the Tag Match...

—No, on that point, I will
be the one to fulfill your wish!

A deep voice full of energy—
Everyone turned around at that high-spirited sound.

name: Jinn
text:
Yeah. I was hesitating about how to get involved, which is unlike me—
But I'm a genie of smoke, a spirit who fulfills wishes!

name: Jinn
text:
And you are the children who need help right now.
Come, rely on me as much as you want!!

Jinn, with his powerful arms crossed and his thick
shoulders raised, declared with a heavy breath. However—

name: Color Gang
text:
Haaah!? You're with the Asakusa group, and aren't you a 'teacher' on top of that?
We hate you people as much as cops... No, even more than that!

name: Jinn
text: <p2 style="font-size: 140%">———!!

name: Color Gang
text:
Exactly. Teachers who try to act cool but end up
abandoning students easily are just what they are.

name: Color Gang
text:
In the first place, if there were any decent
teachers, we might not have had to leave school...

name: Jinn
text: <p2 style="font-size: 140%">————!!

dialogue_after_selection.text: As [Player] tries to argue with the children, Jinn stops them with his hand and shakes his head silently.

options.text: (Try to persuade them that he's a good teacher)

dialogue_after_selection.text: As [Player] tries to argue with the children, Jinn stops them with his hand and shakes his head silently.

name: Color Gang
text:
...You use us because you want to think of yourself
as a good teacher. It's for your own sake, not ours.

name: Color Gang
text:
If not— There's no way a teacher would go out
of their way to get involved with 'people like us'.

name: Color Gang
text:
It's true that we wanted to win the festival.
I've started to think that it's not bad to have someone help us.

name: Color Gang
text:
But that someone has to be someone we can
truly think of as a friend— And you are the opposite.

The boys leave after spitting out those words.
Jinn is left behind, alone to himself.

name: Jagannath
text:
...Ah. That might have been
some bad timing just now.

options.text: Could it because of Toji's presence just now...?
So that's how much they hate 'teachers'.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Heh, you're still pushing regardless of the timing.
I kinda like strong styles like that too, y'know?

name: Baphomet
text:
...Their past teachers are deeply involved in the way their complex 'devils' are.
Yes, perhaps even more than family—

name: Baphomet
text:
Jinn-sensei, it is not solely because of you.
The existence of a teacher is still a vivid wound for those children.

Baphomet follows them, conveying that anxiously.
And then— Another group timidly appears, crossing paths with them.

name: Ryota
text:
...[Player]. Uu, I finally caught up.
Toji was here, and the atmosphere just wasn't right for talking!

name: Kengo
text:
But that guy really has the face
of a proper police officer just now...

name: Shiro
text:
Yes, it did felt like a sense of urgency because of that...
Could a complicated situation have arisen, [Player]?

name: Triton
text:
Well, patrolling the festival is part of a teacher's job.
This place is a bit dangerous, so I decided to go a bit further just in case.

name: Shiro
text:
So, we decided to accompany
Triton-sensei on his patrol.

name: Shiro
text:
But we happened to be there at a completely bad time—
Wait? Where did Jinn-sensei go?

Everyone hurriedly looked around and found an old lamp on the ground.
With everyone's 'ah' in understanding, Triton approached it, scratching his head.

name: Triton
text:
Please come out, Jinn-sensei.
I— understand how you feel, but...

After a short pause, Jinn appeared with white smoke.
His shoulders were slumped, a stark contrast to his previous attitude.

name: Jinn
text:
...Damn. I showed such a pathetic sight to you, my 'rival'.
No, right now, it's all about the children!

name: Jinn
text:
They're the ones who dropped out of school,
so of course they wouldn't have a good opinion of teachers.

name: Jinn
text:
I lacked imagination... No, I should have known.
But, when I saw them struggling in this festival, I just...

name: Jinn
text:
It is just as they say. I've forced it on them.
Unfeelingly barging in— 'I did it again'...

options.text: You're taking quite a bit of damage...

name: Kengo
text:
No, well... Don't be so down!
It's really not like you, Jinn-sensei!

name: Shiro
text:
—Yes, what Kengo said has a point.
Your willingness to actively help students is a good point of yours, isn't it?

name: Ryota
text:
Y-Yeah! We like that about you,
teach! Right, [Player]?

name: Jinn
text:
...But, they aren't my students.
In fact, they can't even attend school.

name: Triton
text:
Ah, that...
Well, ahem!

name: Triton
text:
Jinn-sensei, you shouldn't be like that.
You're in front of your students now.
You have to set an example for them.

A light provocation, expecting the usual 'banter'.
Even so, Jinn wouldn't let go of his 'gloomy' attitude.

name: Jinn
text:
...That's right.
An impulsive fool like me is already, these days—

name: Jinn
text:
—No, it's nothing.
Dammit, just forget it...

name: Triton
text:
...
Jinn-sensei...

A helpless atmosphere—
Once again was broken by Jagannath's light-hearted voice.

name: Jagannath
text:
Hah, it's the job of cops and teachers to be hated by brats!
Though, you might not exactly be satisfied with that.

name: Jagannath
text:
Anyway, this time around, it was just some bad timing,
and that you tried to close the distance too quickly.

name: Jagannath
text:
Heheh, I'd be in trouble if you keep being depressed?
Since you've come forward, you're gonna have to tag with me.

name: Jinn
text:
But— I'm not wanted, and unless
I'm wanted, my power as a genie is...

name: Jagannath
text:
Don't be attached to success or failure,
just do what you have to do— That's Karma Yoga for you!

Tapping the shoulder of the silent Jinn,
Jagannath bared his teeth as usual.

name: Jagannath
text:
So, I'm gonna move for a little something of my own?
[Player], you go back to persuading the brats.

options.text: You thought of something, didn't you?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Well, yeah, I'm a pranking professional.
When an idea comes to me, I move fast.
That's my way.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Well, yeah, I'm a pranking professional.
When an idea comes to me, I move fast.
That's my way.

name: Jagannath
text:
So, I'll leave it to you guys from Shinjuku to get this moping teacher up his feet.
Well then, see you at the Tag Match venue!

name: Shinjuku Members
text: <p2 style="font-size: 135%">—Eeeeeeeehhh!?

Thus, [Player] set out to the base.
They were about to put their heart into persuading them, or so they thought—

options.text: It's not the atmosphere for that.

name: Baphomet
text:
...The float's decorations were destroyed. In the brief moment when I went to the venue,
and while Jack-sama and the others were out for a break with the children.

options.text: Who would do such a thing!?

name: Kirito
text:
Well, I don't even have to say it, but it's probably
revenge from someone who has a grudge against us.

name: Kirito
text:
Did you forget what kind of people we are?
Of course we've 'done things' all over the place.

name: Kirito
text:
Revenge goes around, and evil actions chain together.
...Though, if we'd shown our faces a bit earlier, we might have been able to prevent it.

name: Color Gang
text:
...It's just as Kirito says.
What we've done has come back to us.

name: Color Gang
text:
But even so,
we've worked so hard for it—!

name: Color Gang
text:
Looks like effort doesn't matter.
...I guess there was no point in doing it after all.

name: Color Gang
text:
...It was the same for Black Santa incident.
Out of the selfish reason that we didn't want to be punished.

Discouragement and introspection make them look down weakly.
But just then, one person's words made them look up.

name: Jack Frost
text: —Let's rebuild it.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Street art gets erased all the time.
We can do it better next time, that's all!

name: Tvastar
text:
Yeah, I understand the sense of loss from losing something you're attached to.
But 'skills don't disappear, you get better the more you do it'.

name: Tvastar
text:
In fact, I'll even prepare a special stamina
drink so we can easily stay up all night~!

name: Color Gang
text:
But... The contest is tomorrow, isn't it?
No matter how hard we can try now...

name: Jack Frost
text:
—Even so.
Let's challenge it until the very end anyway.

Decisively, very powerfully.
Jack's smile slowly 'spreads' to the children.

name: Color Gang
text:
...Hehe.
Well, that's what Jagannath would say.

name: Color Gang
text:
Yeah, he'd definitely say that.
'Heheh, that's Karma Yoga for you!'

name: Color Gang
text:
Haha, no way!
That was a really good impression!!

name: Baphomet
text:
—Children...
When on earth did you... like this...

The mood of the place becomes a shade brighter.
The boy who nodded looks at [Player] again.

name: Color Gang
text:
So that's how it is.
Sorry, but it's time we focus on this.

name: Color Gang
text:
We'll cleanly give up on the Tag Match.
[Player], we're super happy that you came, but...

options.text: No, it's too early to give up.
Just win both the Deco-Float Contest and the Tag Match.
Let's win both and take the overall victory!

name: Color Gang
text:
...Ehhh!? You aren't joking, are you?
Well, that's also super like Jagannath.

A bewildered, but favorable chuckle.
The children's hearts loosen further.

name: Color Gang
text:
...Well, we'd be happy if Jagannath fought for us.
But, having some teacher we don't know well be a representative is just...

options.text: It's okay to trust that teacher.
I'm sure everyone will love him.
He's a bit too passionate, though.

name: Color Gang
text:
Well... [Player], if you say so,
I'm sure it's true, but...

'My heart was moved, but I can't afford to admit'—
Kirito gave a snort to his own lack of resolve.

name: Kirito
text:
Well, I hate teachers more than anything.
I hate people looking down on others like they've known everything.

name: Kirito
text:
Out of them, those hard-headed, meddlesome teachers are the worst.
And though he's the textbook definition of that, for some reason, I—

Then, Kirito stopped speaking.
Gazing into space, he continued with a somewhat vulnerable voice.

name: Kirito
text:
But, I wonder why... Regarding him, I feel like it's
okay to take him off the target, just a little bit.

name: Color Gang's Members
text: <p2 style="font-size: 140%">—!!?

name: Color Gang
text:
—Eh!?
Kirito, you'd say something like that!?

name: Baphomet
text:
My...
Even Kirito-sama's heart...

name: Kirito
text:
It's not particularly because [Player]-san said so.
It's just something I had in mind.

name: Kirito
text:
We can judge whether it's self-satisfaction or not by his fighting style,
and it's better to use him than to lose by default, right?

name: Kirito
text:
And besides, if they fight, our hands won't be taken away from the work.
We can just have some of us go and watch and report the situation.

name: Color Gang
text:
Well...
If that's the case...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Kirito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Don't get me wrong, will you?
I'm going to be the one laughing if you make a fool of yourself.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Kirito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Don't get me wrong, will you?
I'm going to be the one laughing if you make a fool of yourself.

options.text: Kirito, you still hate someone else the most, don't you?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Kirito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...You already know that, don't you?
Compared to you, the others are still better.

name: Baphomet
text:
—You used to hate the police,
and that might still be the case now.

name: Baphomet
text:
But, you have learned from meeting Jagannath-sama and
[Player]-sama that not all police are the same, did you not?

name: Baphomet
text:
In that case, couldn't the
same be said for the teachers?

Looking at the children who were watching with solemn attitudes,
Baphomet broke into a smile and winked.

name: Baphomet
text:
Fufu, at the very least...
Can't you believe that [Player]-sama and their partner
are 'not moving with the logic you were talking about'?

Meanwhile, Jagannath visited the
festival's headquarters alone.

At the 'certain proposal' that was tossed to the 'Head' and 'Vice-Head' of each group—
The first to speak was Sanat Kumara of the Asakusa Group.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Hmm... In other words, it's about 'showing the backs of those who lead'.
And at the same time, showing the backs of those who are led.

name: Jagannath
text:
Yeah, I know it's a crazy request.
But, you guys have started to feel for those brats too, haven't ya?

name: Taishakuten
text:
...Spoken like a typical cop. We do have feelings.
After being shown such a lonely struggle, why wouldn't we?

name: Y'golonac
text:
Well, it's fine, isn't it? They're lovable brats,
and in fact, it looks like it'll be exciting in terms of content!

name: Taishakuten
text:
In that case, 'Shibamata' will be borrowing members from 'Kabukicho'—
And you don't mind that, do you, Y'golonac?

name: Y'golonac
text:
Well, we've already come so far!
Isn't this just the perfect oppotunity to deepen the bonds between our groups~?

name: Y'golonac
text:
Besides, Uncle's friends with the Suidocho group members too,
and if everyone's gonna help out, Uncle wants to do the same.

name: Taishakuten
text:
—Is that so? Hmm, personally, I'm not really feeling it.
Oh well, circumstances are circumstances.
I'll lend a hand or two here!

A consensus is formed, and everyone nods at each other.
It was an agreement― Solely for the sake of those children.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
—Alright, then it is decided.
We will significantly change the structure of the 'Tag Match'.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
And— Each group will prepare its best and strongest
fighters to compete with everything they've got!!

Chapter 4:
December's Hot-Blooded School Wars!

The special venue set up in the precincts of 'Shoraionji Temple'—
Was now packed to the brim with enthusiastic spectators.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Alright! That's enough of the pleasant intro from your Uncle.
It's finally time for the highlight of this year's Fighting Festival—
The 'Tag Match'!?

name: Y'golonac
text:
This is a special project that was ripped from the (official) popular MMA fight club...
No, a special project inspired by its popularity.

name: Y'golonac
text:
The live commentary will be handled by Sanat Kumara, and the analysis by Baphomet!
Alright, you two, give it your best!!

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Mmm. I am Sanat Kumara, providing the supportive commentary (?).
I shall push this project forward— No, I'll fire it up with my burning words!!

name: Baphomet
text:
Shamefully, I shall be serving as the commentator. I will strive to provide
easy-to-understand explanations based on the knowings of my 'Rule'.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Shall we get started? First up, the Kabukicho Group tag-team, 'Kichorabu',
featuring the duo of Ellie and Kresnik from 'Kabukicho' Academy!!

name: Ellie
text:
Uwwaa... It's evening, so I'm still a bit sleepy,
but this seems like such a fun opportunity, doesn't it, Kuru-pi?

name: Kresnik
text:
Hey, don't call me with that nickname outside of school—
Actually, I'd prefer if you refrained from it inside school as well.

name: Baphomet
text:
Ellie-sama is the Queen of Kabukicho, one gifted with beautiful footwork.
As for Kresnik-sama... He also seems to possess excellent martial arts skills.

name: Baphomet
text:
Though you have tried to hide it, I do have some knowledge
regarding 'heretic execution' from another land... So I am able to tell.

name: Suzuka
text:
Show us what you've got, Kres-sensei!
Try showing us something pathetic, I'm gonna take your place!

name: Y'golonac
text:
Next up, the Asakusa Group tag-team, 'Asokenkai'!
The duo of Amanojaku and Qinglong from 'Umamichi' Academy!!

name: Amanojaku
text:
W-Wow. There are so many people, I'm getting nervous...
But... I want to try my best!

name: Qinglong
text:
Mmm, it is a fine chance to test the fruits of our training.
It has been a while since I was in a real fight—
But I shall show you what a high-ranking Celestial Dragon is made of.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
This tag-team is also a master-disciple duo from Asakusa's premier 'Kung Fu' dojo.
I have participated a few times myself, and...
They seem to be quite the formidable 'experts'?

name: Tianzun
text:
Hmm, I wonder if Master Qinglong will be alright?
I just hope his daily neglect of health doesn't come back to bite him.

name: Y'golonac
text:
And next, for the Shibamata Group, 'Teijashu', from Suidocho Business Academy~?
The tag-team of Taishakuten and Gyobu!!

name: Taishakuten
text:
Gah, this is hard to do if it's not a one-on-one!?
Besides, I'm teaming up with my school's teacher for a brawl!?

name: Gyobu
text:
Haha, don't be so picky, Young Master Taishakuten.
Despite my own years, my heart is still racing fighting alongside a beloved student, yes?

name: Y'golonac
text:
Believe it or not, Gyobu is a 'assist' player sent from Kabukicho!
He's a very important teacher who handles dealer training classes at Suidocho.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Wait, it's nothing but master-disciple tags...
What an interesting coincidence~? Hihihi!

name: Nobuharu
text:
Go, go! Taishakuten-senpai, Gyobu-sensei!
Uu, seeing those two on the same ring is just too exhilarating...!

name: Y'golonac
text:
And finally, the Ikebukuro Group—
The tag-team of Jagannath and Jinn from the 'Color Gang'!!
華羅悪狂軍 (kara-a-gyan-gu / Flower-Gauze-Evil-Crazy-Army): Color Gang put under ateji kanji

name: Jagannath
text:
Heheh, shall we consider ourselves master-disciple here too?
You can treat me as your beloved student, Jinn-sensei.

name: Jinn
text:
W-What is with this lineup?
Qinglong-sensei from Asakusa, Kresnik-sensei from Kabukicho...

name: Jinn
text:
Rather, before I knew it, I was made to stand in the ring,
even though 'those kids' haven't even told me their wishes yet...!

Ignoring the bewildered Jinn, an incredible cheer shook the ring.
This was because a 'star player' from the original Fight Club had appeared.

name: Jagannath
text:
I really can't get enough of being the center of attention in the ring.
The more eyes are on me, the more I burn! Well, shall we get this party started!?

The performance of stripping off his entrance gear made the crowd even more 'frenzied'.
In that heat, the members of 'Shinjuku' Academy were also shouting from the audience.

name: Kengo
text:
Alright, get fired up!
I'm rooting for you, Jinn-sensei, Jagannath!!

name: Shiro
text:
This is certainly some incredible energy, but...
What's with every team being a tag-team of a teacher and a student?

name: Triton
text:
Mmm. It is a spectacle. It is rare for teachers from
so many schools to gather in one place like this.

name: Toji
text:
(...What is your goal, Jagannath?
What are you trying to pull with this performance?)

name: Ryota
text:
Ah, you've got that scary 'expression' again.
You promised no police mode while you're with us, Toji!

name: Toji
text:
Hm? Oh, you're right, Ryota.
For now, I'll keep my mission to my own.
However, this strange match is—

options.text: I can sort of imagine why.
I'm guessing it's something like this...

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
—What? Teaming up teachers and
students for the Tag Match?

name: Jagannath
text:
Yeah. Like I've told you before,
those brats have a lot of trauma regarding teachers.

name: Jagannath
text:
The best way to resolve that is to face them head-on.
Ideally, through a serious clash between some wild teachers.

name: Jagannath
text:
I guarantee it'll be interesting as a performance too.
As a professional MMA fighter, I'll stake my word on it— Well?

name: Toji
text:
—I see, that sounds plausible.
It seems like a form of shock therapy.

name: Triton
text:
...But before that, with Jinn-sensei
acting so unusual and spineless—

name: Y'golonac
text:
Anyway, a physical battle where 'Sacred Artifacts' and weapons are banned begins now!
By the way, this is also a rip-of... Let's call it a 'respect rule' based on the original.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Other than that, there are almost no rules.
The tag-team still standing at the end wins.
It's for real, but be careful not to get too badly hurt, okay?

name: Y'golonac
text:
Ah, right, right! I have to introduce them while I'm at it.
We have a medical team on standby just in case! Ta-da!

name: Shennong
text:
Make sure we don't have to step in, okay?
Anyone who does anything dangerous gets a real~ painful punishment from Big Brother?

name: Mineaki
text:
This battle, where some of Tokyo's strongest have gathered—
I'll be watching closely to see it for myself.

options.text: Even the medical team are teachers!?

name: Jinn
text:
E-Even Shennong-sensei and Mineaki-sensei...
Is this all your doing, Jagannath!?

name: Jagannath
text:
Well, the medical team was a coincidence, but as for the rest...
Yeah, it's a 'prank' I set up.

name: Jagannath
text:
You know it yourself, don't you? Those brats weren't lucky with their teachers.
In that case, we just have to show them the good side and smash that trauma!

name: Jinn
text:
...But, even so... Those kids don't expect
anything from me, on the contrary—

Paying attention to the corner of the stands where the boys are gathered,
Jinn and the others look over from the ring with trepidation.

name: Color Gang
text:
...Damn, how are we supposed to cheer for this?
With the number of teachers here, isn't this the worst event ever?

name: Color Gang
text:
Well, for now...
Should we just cheer for Jagannath?

name: Kirito
text:
Well, I get the aim of this setup, but whether
things go that well for 'you' is a different matter, isn't it?

name: Kirito
text:
I can't take Oniwaka-san's place in underground Ikebukuro.
Would you really able to take the place of someone else's teacher?

name: Kirito
text:
...Well, I'll be taking a
good look at you, 'Teacher'.

name: Jinn
text:
Ugh...
What am I even doing here...!?

Jinn was already on the verge of being knocked down mentally.
Jagannath immediately wrapped his arm around Jinn's shoulder.

name: Jagannath
text:
Heheh. Honestly, I can't say that I get a genie's desire to serve,
but let's prove that your teacher's spirit is 'more than just that'!

name: Y'golonac
text:
Now that the voltage in the venue is at its peak,
shall we get going!? The match starts at Uncle's signal!!

name: Y'golonac
text:
[Player], let's cheer for the athletes together!
Look, you can even sit on Uncle's lap~!

options.text: You're the host, so do your job properly!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh, how harsh!
I'll do my job, so at least stay by my side, okay?

text:
Leaving Jinn's feelings behind, the gong is sounded.
The players move at once, locking in to fight their nearest opponent.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
—Hm!?
T-This is—

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
With eight people fighting at once,
I don't know where to start the commentary!!

name: Baphomet
text:
Then, shall we focus on these people first?
The two who are having a conversation that feels like destiny amidst the exchange of blows.

name: Kresnik
text:
—I never thought we'd meet
again like this, Jagannath.

name: Jagannath
text:
Heh, that's my line.
The world must be ending if someone like you becomes a teacher, huh?

name: Jagannath
text:
Quite hard to imagine the man who wouldn't stop scouting me in
my Public Security days ended up like this. Just who got you into this?

name: Kresnik
text:
Circumstances are not to be underestimated.
It might be surprising, but it feels like I've drifted to the place I belong.

name: Kresnik
text:
Conversely, you seem to be the same as ever?
I heard you keep turning down invitations from the counter-terrorism squad— Hah!!

name: Jagannath
text:
—Whoops! I hate being buried in police work.
What I want to do isn't just that— Hah!!

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
That composure to trade quips in the middle of a fierce battle... Truly experts!
However, that 'man' who's trading blows equally with a professional 'fighter' like Jagannath—

name: Baphomet
text:
Yes, the intensity that occasionally glimpses through is extraordinary.
Not just in martial arts, but likely top-tier in weapon handling as well.

options.text: I want to cheer for Kuru-pi too...!

name: Ellie
text:
...Seriously, you're so different from how you are at school, it's hilarious.
Oh, maybe I should record this and show it to everyone?

name: Amanojaku
text:
—U-Um! I'm fighting you right now,
so please focus more on me, Ellie-san!

name: Ellie
text:
Hm? Sorry, sorry. But you see, I can't really get serious against a
cute boy like you, can I? Why don't you have a fun little dance with your Big Sister?

name: Amanojaku
text:
Eh? A cute boy...
Are you talking about me—

name: Amanojaku
text:
Like I'd ever be that~!! I'm an ogre high schooler, you know!?
Even after seeing this scary form, you're still talking that cute crap—

name: Amanojaku
text:
Wait, no!!
Attacking with a 'Sacred Artifact' is a foul!!

name: Ellie
text:
...Eh, what was that? Both versions of you are super cute, aren't they?
Is it like a 'buy two get one' deal!?

name: Ellie
text:
Fufufu, very well. Then Big Sister will chase after you.
Amanojaku-kun... Try to run as fast as you can, alright?

name: Amanojaku
text:
H-Heeh...!?
Wait, uwaaaaaa—!!

name: Y'golonac
text:
Ugh... Ellie's bad side is coming out in full force.
Sure hope it doesn't become a trauma for that kid...

note:
I find his ogre form kinda cute too
imagine running from 2 people at once

name: Baphomet
text:
Float like a butterfly, sting like a bee...
This famous boxing phrase is perfect for Ellie-sama's 'style' of attack.
However—

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Yeah, she has an overwhelming amount of footwork...
Or rather, she has extremely bad foot manners.
This is supposed to be a fistfight, but those heels are practically lethal weapons!

name: Qinglong
text:
Mmm, you are suppressing your fierce spirit well—
No, you are getting along with it well, Amanojaku.

name: Gyobu
text:
Hahaha, so you must be the student that young man is looking after?
I've heard many rumors about you, Qinglong-sensei.

name: Qinglong
text:
Goodness, the reality is whether I'm looking after him,
or if I'm the one being looked after.

name: Qinglong
text:
More importantly, I've heard rumors about you as well. Gyobu-sensei from Suidocho,
famous for your caring nature and your legendary 'Tanuki Fist'— Howaah!

name: Gyobu
text:
—Now, now! Please don't be so humble.
I wonder how much my Tanuki Fist can stand against your Tai Chi.

name: Gyobu
text:
Besides, comparing a teacher like you, who even acts as a probation officer,
to someone like me who's practically a 'commissioned' worker,
that would only invite divine punishment.

name: Gyobu
text:
Still, it's difficult once you've become like family, isn't it?
Especially when it comes to younger people, you tend to show favoritism.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Hmm, it feels like they're having a drink together.
Or maybe, it's like they're having tea on a veranda?

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
And yet, both of them are perfectly without openings.
...As expected, there is weight to the 'years of experience' carved into their bodies.

name: Baphomet
text:
Veteran spacing and breathing, offense and defense stripped of all waste.
It is like the calm before the storm, a touch-and-go tension...

options.text: Tanuki Fist... Maybe I should learn it too?
I can't predict who will win...

name: Qinglong
text:
Oh, that's right, speaking of favoritism— Isn't that delinquent cop
who organized this performance related to you, Gyobu-sensei?

name: Gyobu
text:
Indeed. I've known him since he first
showed his face on the backstreets of Tokyo.

name: Gyobu
text:
When asked, I can't help but take
the job as an assist for Shibamata.

name: Qinglong
text:
Haha, he sure is famous among the probation officers.
They say there's an 'eccentric' police officer who stays close to the bad kids to the end.

name: Gyobu
text:
...A 'neither here nor there' existence is often shunned.
Knowing that, he chose the path of 'having two positions'.

name: Gyobu
text:
For Jagan, his righteousness— Or to use his own term, 'Dharma'.
He says the only way to carry it out is through that path.

name: Gyobu
text:
It might look like he's doing something clever, but...
Haha, choosing such a lifestyle itself is what's clumsy, isn't it?

name: Jagannath
text:
Hey, hey! Don't go blabbing about unnecessary stuff,
Uncle Gyobu!! —Wait, ugh!?

name: Kresnik
text:
Don't you look away during a real fight?
But... Honestly, I'm quite interested myself as well.

name: Kresnik
text:
You asked me why I became a teacher—
But why do you insist on 'being a delinquent cop'?

name: Jagannath
text:
I don't get guys who go from one extreme to another.
Dear former hunter and current teacher, there's no big reason for that.

name: Jagannath
text:
I stick to being a cop and playing the delinquent, because there are
some 'private talks' you just can't have unless you're on their level!

name: Qinglong
text:
...Leading each other on from the same horizon.
Worrying together, crying together, and laughing together.

name: Qinglong
text:
I see, it's the 'chasing two rabbits' that Gyobu-sensei spoke of.
But, I can sympathize with the philosophy of 'Black in the Five Elements' to some extent.

二兎追い (chasing two rabbits): chasing two things at once (and almost always ultimately catching none)
五行の黒 (five elements' black): I'm unsure what this is supposed to mean, but black stands for 水 (sui / water) in the five elements

name: Amanojaku
text:
Goodness, you're talking all high and mighty again...
Even though, your life would be a mess without me.

name: Amanojaku
text:
But... I don't know what would've happened
to me if you hadn't been there, Qinglong-sensei.

name: Amanojaku
text:
The one who taught me to rely on others, and the one
who taught me to make myself my own ally was you, Teacher.

name: Kirito
text:
An ideal relationship of trust between a teacher and a student where they help each other?
What's the point of showing this to the 'have-nots'? You're an idiot.

name: Kirito
text:
You guys don't have to worry, it's just luck. Survival bias, even.
Some roll the dice and get a 1, while others get a 6—

name: Jagannath
text:
No, that's where you're wrong! I'm an 'ambidextrous puncher',
the mirror image of my sworn friend, capable of taking both sides.

name: Jagannath
text:
If you don't like me, just punch me.
I'll punch you too, and then we're even!!

name: Qinglong
text:
Oh, lonely young delinquent cop.
The spirit of trying to protect and help with your own body is noble.

name: Qinglong
text:
But, isn't it difficult to stay close to so many children by yourself?
If necessary, I can introduce you to a reliable probation officer... Haiii!

name: Jagannath
text:
Hey, don't talk to me while you're fighting my uncle!?
But well, I'll gratefully rely on you if I ever need it.

name: Jagannath
text:
Fortunately, this time, these brats have an affectionate
counselor and a cynical older brother figure with them.

name: Kirito
text:
...A cynical older brother figure?
I sure hope you're not talking about me.

name: Color Gang
text: (Wait, he's talking about Kirito, right...!?)

name: Color Gang
text: (There's no one else here but him...!)

name: Jagannath
text:
And— Heh. It's true I can't do it alone, but I'm currently
training a junior who is 'an enemy to all' as my partner candidate!

name: Toji
text:
—Hmph, talking as you please...
Eventually, [Player] will be my... *mumble mumble*.

options.text: ...I want to be of help even a little bit.

dialogue_after_selection.text:
Whether those words reached him or not—
Jagannath looked at [Player] and curled the corner of his mouth into a 'mischievous' smile.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Toji
dialogue_after_selection.text:
N-No, it's nothing. Forget it!
You should be the one to decide your own path.

options.text: I'm not as rowdy as you, senior!?

name: Jagannath
text:
—Anyway. The match started off well,
but what's up with Jinn-sensei?

While exchanging fierce blows with Kresnik,
he shifted his eyes to the 'corner' of the ring. There—

name: Taishakuten
text: <p2 style="font-size: 140%">—Doryaaaa!!

name: Taishakuten
text:
Hey, why aren't you attacking, Jinn-sensei!?
I can't get serious if you're like that!

name: Jinn
text:
Damn, I stood up as their representative,
but was someone unwanted like me really the right choice...?

name: Jinn
text:
No— Now is not the time for brooding!
At this rate, their hatred of teachers will only get worse, but—

Jinn was almost one-sidedly enduring Taishakuten's attacks
without being able to launch a proper counterattack.

It was only natural, for a genie is an existence that responds to wishes—
They are a race that can only exhibit true power when wanted by others.

name: Jagannath
text:
God, even though he's a 'spirit of smoke', his fire is completely out.
I have to force a light out of him somehow...

name: Jagannath
text:
—Hey, Jinn-sensei! If you want to show those brats something good,
Taishakuten is the perfect opponent, isn't he!?

name: Jagannath
text:
I fought a man very similar to him at Mount Govardhana in my hometown.
Unlike this 'Taishakuten', he was authoritative, but he was definitely a strong enemy—

Jagannath raised his voice, intending to fire him up.
And— Something unexpected happened immediately after.

name: Taishakuten
text:
...
A man, similar to me?

name: Taishakuten
text:
Don't tell me—
Are you saying that I am a fake!?

name: Jagannath
text:
Oh? ...I don't know what it is, but
Taishakuten caught fire instead of Jinn-sensei?

name: Jagannath
text:
Well, fine! If he jumps at Jinn-sensei
with that momentum— Wait, oh!?

name: Y'golonac
text:
Whoa? Taishakuten suddenly
changed his target to Jagannath!?

name: Jagannath
text:
Wait, you're coming this way!?
Not me, that way! That way!!

name: Taishakuten
text:
Doryaaaaa!!
Prepare yourself, Jagannath!!

The moment the enraged Taishakuten
entered a large punching motion—

name: Gyobu
text:
—Young Master Taishakuten!
You won't hit anything if you just swing blindly, will you?

name: Gyobu
text:
...Jagan tends to have openings during his 'switches'.
Whether it's in a fight or his usual behavior, that doesn't change.

name: Jagannath
text:
Hey, Uncle!? We may be in the same guild,
but aren't you talking a bit too much!?

name: Gyobu
text:
—Sorry, Jagan. Right now, this young master
is also my beloved 'student' from Suidocho.

name: Y'golonac
text:
O-Openings during a switch?
I can't see anything like that...

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
No, indeed, a slight opening is visible when switching between left and right.
Though even if pointed out, it's not an opening an ordinary person could exploit.

name: Baphomet
text:
However— For Taishakuten-sama, it would be a different story.
He has that reaction speed, dynamic vision, and above all, combat instinct.

name: Gyobu
text:
Listen here, you mustn't let blood rush to your head in gambling or anything else.
I've been drilling that into you daily, haven't I, Young Master?

name: Taishakuten
text:
...Ugh, this is so hard.
I really can't go against my teacher!

name: Taishakuten
text:
—But my head has cooled down, Gyobu-sensei.
I'd prefer you didn't call me 'Young Master', but I've recieved— your teachings!

name: Jagannath
text:
Gah, half of it went as planned, but the most important part isn't working!
It's Jinn-sensei! We have to light a fire in Jinn-sensei's heart!!

name: Jinn
text:
—Damn, what am I even doing?
Now that I've stood here, I have to work hard even if I'm not wanted...

name: Kengo
text:
Hey, he's practically just standing there.
Showing them a sight like that would have the opposite effect, wouldn't it!?

options.text: How can we light a fire in his heart?
Should we just physically set him on fire?

name: Ryota
text:
Ah, what should we do!?
I've never seen Jinn-sensei like that, and I can't bear to watch!

Just as the students of Shinjuku Academy let their frustration explode,
the man who had been glaring in silence opened his mouth nearby.

name: Triton
text:
............
...I completely agree.

name: Ryota
text: —Eh?

name: Triton
text:
Ah, I can no longer just watch in silence!
In that case, we are also entering the ring, 'Yakushimaru'!!

name: Ryota
text:
Eeeeeeh, we're getting into the ring!?
Wait, me as well!? Why? Uwaaaaa!!

When Triton and his student forcibly intruded by kicking through the wire mesh,
the athletes showed surprise while continuing to fight, and the venue stirred.

name: Jinn
text:
T-Triton-sensei!?
And— Even Yakushimaru!?

name: Triton
text:
I, am Triton of Shinjuku Academy!
And— My beloved student, Ryota Yakushimaru!

name: Triton
text:
To inspire a smoldering colleague,
we shall also be participating in this master-disciple battle!

name: Triton
text:
I couldn't find any words to say earlier—
But as long as we can trade our blows, we can make it work!!

name: Licho
text:
Participating... Wait, but for which side!?
Besides, there's no way the groups would allow such a sudden participation—

name: Sanat Kumara
text: <p2 style="font-size: 140%">I shall allow it!!

name: Licho
text:
Ehhhhhhh!?
You're allowing it, General Manager!?

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Of course. If it is an act to push a 'colleague' to
greater heights, then there is no reason to stop them!

name: Y'golonac
text:
Well, this project was reassembled for that purpose anyway,
so it's fine, isn't it? It's an interesting development, hihihi.

name: Taishakuten
text:
I don't mind either.
It's no fun fighting a 'damp' Jinn-sensei anyway!

name: Taishakuten
text:
If anything, why don't we all fan the flames?
We just have to wrap him in a vortex of heat that he can't ignore!

name: Jagannath
text:
...Haha! This is truly a Fighting Festival!
A festival for lovable simpletons... Isn't this just the best!?

options.text: I don't even know who to cheer for anymore...

name: Ryota
text:
Eeeeh, we've been accepted somehow?
If that's the case... I'll just run away with all my might in the ring!

name: Kengo
text:
Wait, you're running away!?
Wait, why did you pull up Ryota instead of me, Triton-sensei!?

name: Triton
text:
—Hey, what's the matter, Jinn-sensei!?
Isn't the flame that's supposed to be ever-burning dying inside you?

name: Triton
text:
If you, who is always annoyingly passionate,
are like that, it throws me off my own rhythm!

name: Triton
text:
As long as you're in that state, I cannot afford
to leave Kyoma-sensei's wings to you in the future!!

Jinn receives the punch thrown along with the provocation with his right hand.
Immediately after gnashing his teeth, a slight fire lit up in his eyes.

name: Jinn
text:
...Damn! I'm not brooding because I want to!
Teachers have teacher problems, and genies have genie problems— Yoo!!

name: Triton
text:
Ho, and what are they specifically!?
As usual, I won't know unless you scream it at my face!!

Triton attacked relentlessly, and Jinn simply took it.
The barrages were like waves, slowly pushing Jinn back.

It was less of the onslaught, and more of the
hesitation and conflict that created his lack of composure—
Jinn, who had been enduring with clenched teeth, finally began to spill his heart.

It was the serving habit of the genie of smoke.
Jinn, wanting to be someone's wish, had tucked
his own wishes away just like a genie in the lamp.

name: Jinn
text:
I cared for them too much, and I ended up spoiling them.
I let myself get carried away, and I ended up hurting them.

Because he continued to fulfill wishes indiscriminately,
Jinn had once hurt his own master.

Jinn 'listens to wishes too much'.
According to the original story of the most famous genie of the lamp—

A genie fulfilled many wishes for a young man who obtained the lamp.
But as soon as it was stolen by his enemy, he fulfilled the enemy's wishes as well.

name: Jinn
text:
Crude as I am, I've messed up in the past.
That's why, I intended to restrain myself.

'That's why', I wanted to be like that teacher.
I wanted the intelligence to be able to 'restrain my own wishes'.

Once, God told a king that he could be 'granted anything', but he still
restrained himself from taking that offer. I admired the way that king was.

name: Jinn
text:
For some reason, I can't control my heart well at this festival.
Even though the residual smoke of Y'golonac's Rule is gone,
damn, my body is throbbing again...

name: Y'golonac
text:
Hmm? That faint thing on your shoulder...
Is it a 'hickey' from Uncle's bite?
Don't tell me— Sarutahiko missed a spot!?

name: Y'golonac
text:
Eeeeeh? It's no ordinary feat to suppress your innate desires
in this festival venue where Uncle's influence is increasing...!

name: Triton
text:
I see... But, didn't you teach your students not to fear failure?
That 'you can start over even if you fail'?

name: Triton
text:
Kyoma-sensei is no longer with us.
I am asking you, are you truly deadset on leaving that role to me alone?

sentence literally translates to 'Kyoma-sensei isn't here'
I'm unsure where this event falls on timeline
chronologically, but it is most likely that Triton meant it that way

name: Triton
text:
If that teaching is your wish itself, you should
show it to the students with your own body! —Taaaaa!

name: Jinn
text:
Ugh... Shut up, I know!
Failures can be made up for— 'in most cases'!!

name: Jinn
text:
But, a teacher's failure hurts the student!
I didn't want to hurt them... I just wanted to be the one who fulfills wishes!!

name: Kresnik
text:
—I understand that too.
I'm second to none when it comes to being full of doubt.

name: Kresnik
text:
Pardon the intrusion. I might be quite similar to Jinn-sensei.
I can't count the times I've messed up while thinking it was for the best.

name: Kresnik
text:
However, I'm still a rookie myself.
My students still look down on me, and they talk to me like we're just friends.

name: Ellie
text:
...Listen, if you want them to listen to you,
I think showing this strength at school would do it, Kuru-pi?

name: Kresnik
text:
Hahaha, I don't exactly want
to 'subjugate' my students, Ellie.

name: Ellie
text:
...Hmph. Well, fine.
Ah, Amanojaku-kun, I found your openingー!

name: Amanojaku
text:
Uwaa! That's why... I'm scared of you!!
Dammit, help me out here, Qinglong-sensei——!!

name: Ryota
text:
T-This way, Amanojaku!
Let's run away together with all our might!!

name: Qinglong
text:
Haha, I am truly grateful that Amanojaku
have gained some interesting friends himself!

name: Qinglong
text:
Anyway, even for a teacher, failure is unavoidable.
I've learned, that showing your form 'after' you've erred is the true duty of a teacher.

name: Gyobu
text:
That's right, it's the same for an old tanuki who has aged.
Take myself for instance, a failure who was sealed in a burrow at a mistake's moment.

name: Jinn
text:
...A teacher's duty is to impart study and techniques.
The rest is just being a role model and helping generously when asked.

name: Jinn
text:
I often think that, maybe,
I should do that too— Doryaaaa!!

name: Triton
text:
—Hmph!! That might be how it originally is, but in this Tokyo where
'Transients' from foreign lands gather, something like that won't do!

name: Triton
text:
There are some things that can only be achieved by diving in headfirst,
even if it feels like you're being overbearing!!

name: Jinn
text:
Hah, you're oblivious!? I'm saying that I'm envious
of a teacher who's as exemplary as you!

name: Triton
text:
Exemplary!? Hahaha!
You've said it, Jinn-sensei!

name: Triton
text:
There were nights when I envied your unyielding spirit.
Like the smoke of the heavens, you poured your overflowing passion
onto your students, and you valued their very freedom!!

name: Triton
text:
...But, I possess the polar opposite of yours, Jinn-sensei.
By enforcing rigid discipline, I have once crushed the spirit of a promising student.

name: Triton
text:
'I'— have been regretting that forever.
Jinn-sensei, a man like you would never commit such a failure!!

name: Jinn
text:
—! Triton-sensei too, just like me—
No, the opposite failure of mine...!?

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Hmm, the passionate words of the souls of teachers exchanged in the ring...
Is this what they call 'educational theory'?

name: Baphomet
text:
They say that there are various theories about the origin of the word 'December'.
But now— Fufu, the teachers who are masters to someone are
running around in their earnest, are they not?

師走 (shiwasu): traditional word for 'December', combining 師 (shi / masters, priests, etc.) and 走 (wasu / running)
describing how everyone's busy preparing to wrap up the year and moving on to the next

name: Mineaki
text:
—Hahaha, should we have stood in the ring too
rather than being in the medical space, Doctor Shennong?

name: Shennong
text:
No, no, that would be
quite out of place, Doctor Mineaki.

name: Mineaki
text:
Is that so? Regardless of the circumstances that led to now,
we should be medical teachers who serve as mirrors to each other.

name: Triton
text:
We are polar opposites as teachers, and it seems that we make opposite failures.
Perhaps— that means that we can also complement each other.

name: Triton
text:
That's why we were entrusted with being the assistant
homeroom teachers together. Isn't that right, Jinn-sensei!?

name: Kresnik
text:
I understand that argument. I also have a colleague whose circumstances
are close to mine, yet he is the one I would refuse to lose to.

name: Kresnik
text:
Oil and water— I don't know what it is that he has in mind,
but I believe we only found our worth by clashing, not by playing nice.

name: Kresnik
text:
If he ever breaks... I'll no longer be myself.
Because, I'm entrusting him with the students who don't fit in my own hands.

name: Jagannath
text:
—Heheh. Yeah, that happens!
I have one of those myself, an absolute pain-in-the-ass rival.

name: Jagannath
text:
Truth be told, he's the exact opposite of me,
he's annoying as hell, but I wouldn't exist without him.

Jagannath, laughing 'pleasantly', cast a glance at
the stands for a moment amidst the 'fierce' battle.

name: Toji
text:
...Jagannath.
Our relationship isn't anything as beautiful as that.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Toji
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player]...
As I thought, you've only been learning the worst parts of his personality, haven't you?

options.text: Toji, you look quite cute when you're being acknowledged.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Toji
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player]...
As I thought, you've only been learning the worst parts of his personality, haven't you?

options.text: Geez, just get along with each other.

name: Taishakuten
text:
—Wait, don't you look away while you're fighting me,
Jagannath, Kresnik! This is a match we're in!!

name: Gyobu
text:
Haha, don't say something so tactless, Young Master.
Didn't you agree to the purpose of this performance beforehand?

name: Taishakuten
text:
Gaaaaah, it's throwing me off!
Maybe I shouldn't have agreed after all!?

name: Triton
text:
Jinn-sensei! Just how long are you intending on staying like that?
Do you intend to show such a spineless form to Kyoma-sensei as well?

name: Triton
text:
Whether Kyoma-sensei is with us or not, our students are
always there following in our footsteps... Aren't they?

name: Jinn
text:
—!!
What I've learned... from Kyoma-sensei...!

name: Jinn
text:
—Dammit. Of all people to lecture me, it just had to be you.
I may be a fool, but 'I have to be a different kind of fool from you'!!

Contrary to his introspective words, there was a bud of determination in his eyes.
Setting his wild eyebrows at a sharp angle, Jinn spoke passionately.

name: Jinn
text:
Kyoma-sensei acknowledged someone like me.
He trusted the thoughts and passion for students burning inside me.

name: Jinn
text:
But now, being punched by you hurts more than anything!
The fire has caught on— I won't lose to you, Triton!!

options.text: That's it, go for it, Jinn-sensei!

name: Jinn
text:
Hehe, [Player]. I made you worry too.
It reached me, your support— To the heart of Jinn, the genie of the lamp!

name: Kirito
text:
'Teachers have teachers too', huh...
...Just why is it reminding me about Oniwaka-san?

Tachihara Kirito had spent his life double-crossing every
faction he ever knew, always searching for a back to stab on.

However, even for someone like Kirito, there is someone
whom he 'couldn't betray' in the opposite sense.

A person born of unknown origins and left for dead,
having ran away from the 'master' that taught him the way of spear and naginata.

薙刀 (naginata): traditional polearm originally used by the samurai of feudal Japan
he holds one in his 3✮ sprite

He became the head of a color gang in underground Ikebukuro,
a place where boys with nowhere to go gathered.

With his trust put to none, Hozoin Oniwaka walked away from
the color gang sooner before Tachihara Kirito ever could.

Ah, indeed, in everything he did, he was always one step ahead,
leaving behind the path Kirito would eventually follow.

The more Kirito sought to betray those around him,
the more he realized he was merely chasing after that man's shadow.

Kirito hated families and despised belonging to a crowd,
yet he could never truly say he hated being near that man.

Because, before Kirito could even turn his back on him,
he— had already left Kirito's presence of his own accord.

'But, I couldn't come to hate him.
I wonder why? Perhaps—'

name: Kirito
text:
But still— Haha. To raise such 'annoying' teachers,
he must have been many times the 'annoying' teacher himself.

Even as Kirito continued to hide himself under his usual cynicism,
the atmosphere among the boys around him had shifted before anyone could realize.

name: Color Gang
text:
...Hey. The teachers we know and the teachers
here are completely different, aren't they?

name: Color Gang
text:
I don't particularly think those teachers are good,
but not all teachers are 'winners', after all.

name: Color Gang
text:
Doesn't it make you angry seeing Jinn-sensei losing?
...It's, just like watching ourselves out there.

The children look at each other and fall silent at once.
But that silence didn't last long. Because—

name: Color Gang
text:
...Jinn-sensei, don't give up!
Punch back!!

Jinn looks back with a surprised expression.
The color gang boys were standing up, looking at him.

name: Color Gang
text:
Don't just take all the punches by yourself!
Fight back, please!!

name: Color Gang
text:
I'm sorry for saying terrible things, Teacher!
...So, please don't stay beaten!!

name: Jinn
text:
...
You guys...!

name: Color Gang
text:
Wait, we have to show this to the guys at the hideout too!
—Hey, let's broadcast the match!

name: Color Gang
text:
Jinn-sensei! Good luck!
Show them you're not just someone who gets beaten!!

That sincere shout made Jinn's giant body shudder.
And, as the afterglow of the shudder vanished, in the next instant—

name: Jinn
text: <p2 style="font-size: 140%">Uoooooooooooh!!!

name: Triton
text:
—Haha, you really wouldn't be worth
it if you weren't like this!

name: Jagannath
text:
Heheh, fiiiinally, the fire is lit.
You're certainly late, Jinn-sensei!!

name: Jagannath
text:
Now, shall we show them what a real tag-team can do?
I have a feeling our chemistry is gonna be just fine, Jinn-sensei.

name: Jinn
text:
You guys— You've truly entrusted your wishes to me!!
In that case, I have no wisdom other than responding with my whole body and soul!

name: Jinn
text:
As a teacher, as a genie of smoke, and as 'your Jinn-sensei'!
This body and soul— I shall give my everything to you!!

Outside the special venue where the performance ended, while the enthusiasm was still high—
There, those who had come to meet Jinn and the others after the match were waiting.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
I must 'praise' you for a magnificent battle.
And, the way the souls of the leaders clashed was truly beautiful.

name: Baphomet
text:
Yes, it resonated so much that I could hardly provide commentary halfway through.
As a school counselor, it was a sight that serves as a guidepost for me as well.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Even with the sudden intruders, wasn't the performance just a huge success~?
The way each group fought hard until the very end was quite emotional, wasn't it?

name: Jagannath
text:
Heheh, both the planning and the fighting style of a professional
'mixed martial artist' were quite the sight, weren't they?

options.text: Thank you for showing me something wonderful.

name: Jagannath
text:
That being said, I have to emphasize that 'this result' against those
opponents was only possible thanks to the struggle of our teacher here.

At the end of the proud Jagannath's gaze, the battered Jinn was now
surrounded by the color gang, smiling broadly.

name: Jinn
text:
...Haha, we did it. It feels like we barely made it,
but I managed to snatch the victory for you guys anyway!

One of the children, who had just rushed over with all his might,
said while catching his breath heavily.

name: Color Gang
text:
...Sorry. Even though I hate being lumped together myself,
we said that all teachers are the same—

name: Jinn
text:
You don't have to apologize.
Ah, no matter how far I go, I'm still—

'A teacher who just spoils them.' Without putting it into words,
Jinn crouched down to meet the children's eyes.

name: Jinn
text:
However, I won't rush you anymore.
I'll wait until you let me hear your stories, your wishes.
There's no need to be impatient.

The boys couldn't help but feel a lump in their throats.
They didn't know a teacher who would say such things.

name: Color Gang
text:
...I realized. Even though, not all teachers are the same—
We were angry at them because we didn't want to be grouped up together.

name: Color Gang
text:
Maybe we could try going back to school.
...If we're going to think about that,
there are 'things we have to do before then'.

'Things we have to do'.
Jinn nodded as he savored the meaning and weight of those words.

name: Jinn
text:
...I see. But anyway, remember this as well.
If you wish for it, I'll support you with all my might.

name: Jinn
text:
I'm happy that you're wishing for it.
It's good for there to be at least one teacher like that.

The children nodded back deeply,
and Jinn showed a carefree smile.

name: Baphomet
text:
Thank you, Jinn-sensei. I also give you my greatest thanks
for the answer you showed to those children.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
You've done a great thing, Jinn-sensei.
As a General Manager who cannot afford to lose, it is something I cannot do.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Yeah. It's not smart, and maybe it's even a bit old-fashioned,
but in these times, it might actually hit home for them, don't you think?

name: Kirito
text:
...I won't be moved by 'bonds' myself,
but it reminded me of some not-so-bad things from the past.

name: Kirito
text:
—Well, I've seen the result, so I'll be going now.
I'm not very good at this kind of thing.

As they watch Kirito walk away with steps ever so lightly,
their companions in Shinjuku came to talk to them, just as if they were swapping places.

name: Triton
text:
Honestly, it was about time you get back on your feet.
Still, only you could have unraveled the hearts of those stubborn children, Jinn-sensei.

name: Ryota
text:
It's the result of our hard work, though Triton-sensei and I also worked hard.
...Ah, I moved around so much that I'm hungry!

name: Kengo
text:
You were just running around, weren't you!?
Well, now that you mention it, I'm getting hungry too.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Triton
dialogue_after_selection.text:
What, it's no fun for me if there's no competition.
But, could this incident prove that I'm a little bit better?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hey, don't you give me that!
Weren't you supposed to make a big mistake as well!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Triton
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I was just joking. In fact, my respect for you has grown.
In the end, you really did succeed in moving their hearts.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ryota
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Right, right? [Player], only you would understand my hard work.
I endured well in that situation, didn't I?

options.text: I wanted to go out with Kengo too.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Kengo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
What a coincidence, I was thinking the same thing.
It would be fine to clarify which of us is more suitable as a 'true partner', wouldn't it?

name: Triton
text:
—Well, we are in a festival. Leave Jinn-sensei to me,
you students should go enjoy some street food.

name: Shiro
text:
Is that so? Then, I'll take you up on that...
Toji, [Player], do you want to come too?

name: Toji
text:
Sorry, I need to talk to my fellow police officers for a bit.
I will be— Looking forward to another opportunity, Motoori.

name: Shiro
text:
...I see, I understand. I'm glad I could see you as you are now,
moving forward as a police officer, Toji.

When he put away the smile directed at his old friend who was waving his hand,
Toji spoke to Jagannath in a muffled voice.

name: Toji
text:
...Jagannath. I've understood your motives.
But, we are not leaders, we are merely police officers.

name: Toji
text:
If you have the evidence, shouldn't you take them into
custody and leave the rest to the appropriate experts?

Contrary to his sharp words, there was hesitation in his voice.
As Jagannath watched the smiling children, he responded.

name: Jagannath
text:
...Hey, Toji.
For what purpose do you crack down on those brats?

name: Toji
text:
That is— for the maintenance of order and public safety,
and above all, for them to reform.

name: Jagannath
text:
I don't exactly like hearing the word 'reform', and that's quite
the goody-two-shoes answer, but that's exactly right.

name: Jagannath
text:
However, if we force them into custody now,
that reform will actually be further away.

name: Jagannath
text:
I've seen countless cases like that, and as a former
brat myself, I understand the psychology of those brats better.

name: Jagannath
text:
—Besides, you've already figured it out, haven't you?
You've already seen how they currently are with your own eyes.

name: Toji
text:
...We are the guardians of the law.
A private citizen should be the one to do that.

name: Jagannath
text:
Exactly, so I have a style of punching
as a private citizen, not as a cop.

name: Jagannath
text:
Injustice might just be unforgivable. But if you ask me,
as long as it leads to peace, it doesn't matter which side wins.

options.text: (Look at him with respect deserving of a senior)
Neither of you two are wrong...

text:
Toji thought deeply for a while.
Eventually, while keeping his eyes on the ground, he asked briefly.

name: Toji
text:
...Why do you go that far?
To try and stay close to the bad kids from the side of the police?

Then, the black tiger cop's expression flickered for a split second,
recalling a scene that was burned into his mind.

name: Jagannath
text:
I just answered Kresnik that in the match earlier.
...But, if I were to add one thing—

name: Jagannath
text:
That's probably because I've
experienced a bitter failure.

name: Toji
text: ...A bitter failure?

name: Jagannath
text:
Yeah. 'There are people in the world that cannot be saved'.
With that kind of detached view, the old me just gave up on trying to lead others.

name: Jagannath
text:
And— That happened to
lead to a tragic conclusion.

name: Jagannath
text:
That's why I'm doing it this style.
Especially, for the kids that still have a future in front of them.

Jagannath turned his serious eyes toward Toji,
who was lost in thought again.

name: Jagannath
text:
Just a little bit more, yeah? Putting aside the victory of the festival,
as long as they accomplish it, they can move forward. Positively, even.

name: Jagannath
text:
Toji, you're free to make whatever judgment you want.
But I won't let you, my fellow officer, stop what I'm going to punch.

options.text: Well, that's where I come in.

text:
The longest silence of the day was sandwiched between them.
Soon, Toji shook his head and pushed out a breath.

name: Toji
text:
...Haaah. I've understood your stance.
It's different from mine, but I think I can take it into 'consideration'.

name: Toji
text:
However— I don't think I can hold
back the headquarters anymore...

It was immediately after such an ominous mutter was leaked.
Jagannath and Toji's devices rang loudly at the same time.

Naturally, the two looked at each other, and Jagannath,
who glanced at his own device, shrugged his shoulders.

name: Jagannath
text:
Oh dear, 'speak of the devil'.
Hah, I need to brace myself a bit.

name: Jagannath
text:
—So, we're going to show our faces for a bit.
Can I leave the scene to you, buddy?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hehe, what a reliable response.
That part of you— is really helping me.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yeah, of course. I'll make it 'okay'.
Because that's how I've done things until now.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Heheh, you don't have to be so cute.
Just leave everything to your reliable senior!

text:
When the two, who had solidified their unspoken sense of solidarity, left,
[Player] joined the children who were a little distance away.

Over there, the atmosphere was bright and full of energy,
and the topic had already shifted to tomorrow's program.

name: Y'golonac
text:
But with this, every group has one win, right?
In other words, it means the final will be decided by the Deco-Float Contest!

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Mmm, our decorations are truly wonderful.
We've pursued the very essence of Asakusa, resulting in a finish like no other!

name: Y'golonac
text:
Hehe, that's also true for Kabukicho!
After all, it's the city of the night that's strong with flashy things.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Hihihi, how about it? The Ikebukuro brats are getting greedy too, right?
Now that Jinn and Jagan finally snatched the victory.

At that question, the boys were suddenly brought back to reality.
Recalling the disaster of their decorations, they let out heavy sighs.

name: Color Gang
text:
Of course we are, but...
It might be too difficult now.

name: Baphomet
text:
...You are already changing a lot.
Even without 'such an event', you would have been able to change...

name: Jinn
text:
—???
What on earth are you guys talking about...?

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
—What, the decorations were secretly destroyed!? An act against the spirit
of the Fighting Festival, which values frontal collision— Absolutely unforgivable!

name: Y'golonac
text:
It might be true that they're partly to blame...
But it's a petty retaliation, it makes Uncle angry too!

name: Jinn
text:
My goodness............
That must have been very tough—

name: Jinn
text:
No, you guys! That's exactly when
you should make a wish to me, a genie—

Jinn almost said it on impulse, but quickly swallowed it back.
He pulled back his leaning upper body and shook his head vigorously.

name: Jinn
text:
(—No, don't move carelessly!
These kids are sincerely reflecting on it, as the 'consequence of their evil deeds'!)

name: Jinn
text:
(Was I about to ruin that with my intervention?
To become a teacher like Kyoma-sensei, I need to be careful...!)

It was at that moment that a warm hand was placed on his shoulder.
Jinn turned around with a mix of surprise and looked at the owner of that hand.

name: Triton
text:
...Jinn-sensei, that's my role.
The one to say that they've reflected enough is you.

name: Triton
text:
What we should give them now is the experience of 'a teacher being a great
help to them'. If it were the usual you, you'd say that, wouldn't you?

name: Jinn
text:
...
Triton-sensei...

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
A genie's power, huh... How to exercise it is, of course,
something you should choose yourself.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
However— I believe that those who have the power to save others
sometimes bear the obligation to exercise it.

name: Y'golonac
text:
...Hmm? If you want, Uncle can even make a contract with the brats
and help them? I won't guarantee what will happen, though!

name: Baphomet
text:
I wish for these children to be that way.
Now— may we ask you for a favor once more?

options.text: As a bit of an early Christmas present!
I don't think I've ever seen you using your 'Rule' before, teach.

name: Jinn
text:
I... If my lending a hand
would be for your sake...

Jinn, who gathered the passionate gazes on himself,
checked the expressions of everyone one by one.

The moment Triton, with whom he locked eyes last, nodded strongly—
Jinn's eyes instantly brightened, and the fire of passion dwelled there.

name: Jinn
text:
—Alright, you guys! Now, make a wish to me.
I became a teacher for guys like you!!

Thus, [Player] and the others moved from a corner
of the festival venue toward the main venue.

There, Jack, Tvastar, and all the children who had
