continued production at the base were also present.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Um... Are you seriously intending on fixing the decorations?
The broken decorations are at the base.

name: Jinn
text:
Don't look down on a genie's power!
As long as I'm strongly wished for, I can 'do anything'.

name: Jinn
text:
...Though strictly speaking, there's a condition that it
has to be within this festival venue, which is an 'otherworld'.

name: Color Gang
text:
No, even that is more than enough.
Because, our decorations were completely destroyed.

name: Jinn
text:
Well, it's better if you can see it for yourself.
First, let's 'get into the mood'— There!!

name: Color Gang's Members
text:
Jinn-sensei became
Santa Claus!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hmph, a wish for this Smoky Santa?
You're a cute student, so I'll especially fulfill anything for you!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
But for now, their wishes take priority.
I can fulfill your wish anytime!

options.text: Doesn't it suit you a bit too well!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text: Of course! When it comes to someone who looks good in red and fulfills 'children''s wishes, it's either this Jinn or Santa Claus! Gahahaha!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text: I'll secretly fulfill your wish later if you want, but for now, their wishes come first!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...W-What kind of wish is that!?
Don't you tease your own teacher!
...You were joking, right?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Anyway, their wishes come first.
I can fulfill your wish anytime!

name: Jinn
text:
Now, wish with all your might! I shall respond to them!
「Fleeting Visions」— Labbaika Mawlaya!!

Suddenly, white smoke billowed with tremendous force, covering the view.
When the smoke was scattered by the cold wind, what appeared was—

name: Color Gang
text:
Uwaaa! Our decorations are completely fixed—
I mean, they were about to be done, but they're properly finished!?

name: Color Gang
text:
R-Really... All that's left is to
assemble the parts onto the 'float'!!

name: Baphomet
text:
My... It is just like magic.
Children, you were making something so complex...

name: Color Gang
text:
...Wait, is the scratch on this
part the one I accidentally made?

name: Jinn
text:
Yeah, that's right. This is the decorations you were making,
'returned to the state before being destroyed and completed'.

name: Jinn
text:
Heheh, I told you, didn't I?
As long as you wish for it, I can do almost anything!

Hearing those proud words, the children
glances at each other almost at the same time.

name: Jinn
text:
—Huh?
What's wrong, you guys?

name: Color Gang
text:
Actually... We've been making another
Deco-Float decoration since yesterday.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Another one? Didn't the rule say each group
can only enter one Deco-Float into the contest?

name: Color Gang
text:
When we were introduced to Jack and Tvastar, we were quite... happy.
That, we thought that 'we might be able to do it' if those two were here.

name: Jack Frost
text:
—Haha. Unrelated to the contest, they started saying something unreasonable,
wanting to make a separate Deco-Float to show their gratitude.

name: Tvastar
text:
Fufufu. Strictly speaking, it felt like it started with
'we want to repay a debt', but soon changed to 'gratitude'~

name: Color Gang
text:
In short, this is the Deco-Float that Baphomet will ride,
and the other is— the float for Jagannath.

name: Color Gang
text:
It has nothing to do with the contest, but...
Could you help us fix that one too?

Touched by the innocence of the brats who were asking timidly,
Jinn rubbed his eyes with his fist.

name: Jinn
text:
Well, if that wasn't the most stylish story I've ever heard...
That wish of yours— I'll accept it all!!

Again, a large amount of smoke gushed out endlessly,
and from it, colorful decorative parts appeared.

Just like the previous decorations, they were still in the state before assembly,
but those parts clearly expressed the characteristics of the delinquent cop.

name: Color Gang's Members
text:
...A-Amazing!!
No matter how many times I see it, it's super amazing!!

name: Color Gang
text:
...*sniff*. I was halfway on giving up, thinking it might have been hopeless.
Truly, truly, thank you, Jinn-sensei!

name: Jinn
text:
...!! W-Well, this is a piece of cake!
Ah, this is what it means to be a genie...!!

options.text: His desire to serve is being fully satisfied.

name: Color Gang
text:
—! Actually, let's hide it with
a cloth before Jagannath finds it!!

name: Color Gang's Members
text: Hehehehehe!!

The children were frolicking, unable to contain their excitement.
When that joy reached its peak, one of the boys blurted out.

name: Color Gang
text:
Ah, seriously, this is the best Christmas ever.
I've never got to celebrate Christmas before, so I'm even happier...

name: Color Gang
text:
Me too. I love the gifts, but I've
always wanted to see the Christmas lights.

name: Color Gang
text:
—!! That's it, Teacher! If possible, could you
make our stall area sparkling like Christmas—

name: Color Gang
text:
H-Hey, you idiot! Don't get carried away and ask for childish things!
Well, I do think it would be beautiful if we could do that...!

name: Jinn
text:
H-Huh? You guys are something else.
So you still have things you want to wish for?

name: Jinn
text:
A-Ahem. If you truly wish with 'Jinn-sensei, please',
I could think of it as a special request...

name: Jinn
text:
It's exactly the third one, so this is the last one, okay?
No 'increase the number of wishes' around here, alright!?

name: Color Gang
text:
—Really!?
J-Jinn-sensei, please!!!

name: Jinn
text:
...!!! If you go that far,
I suppose I have no choice, do I? Heheh...!!

name: Y'golonac
text:
W-Wait, you brats!!
It's unfair if only your territory is sparkling!?

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Mmm, almost anyone should like sparkling things!
It should be equal, and the entire festival venue should be sparkling!!

name: Baphomet
text:
Oh my, Sanat-sama, it seems that you still have the
childlike heart that many people would have lost.
Or could it be... A habit of your 'species'?

name: Baphomet
text:
Even so, is the entire venue a bit too wide?
Jinn-sensei, there should be a limit even for you... Yes?

Everyone present was looking at him with expectation.
Jinn twitched his nose and puffed out his thick chest—

name: Jinn
text:
Hahaha! As long as you wish for it, nothing is impossible for a genie!
This Jinn-sensei's 'presents' won't end with a shot or two— There!!

the background would have changed here...
if I actually found the non-glittering variant for it in the files
sorry but you've been spoiled of it all this time

name: Color Gang's Members
text:
Uwaaaaaa—!!
It's Christmas!!!

name: Tvastar
text:
Hmm, this is amazing!
I feel like I've seen something very good!?

name: Jinn
text:
Gahahaha!! While you're at it, you lot better
become Santas a day early and make those kids happy— Hah!!

name: Y'golonac
text:
W-Whoa!? Uncle has truly become a
hasty, evil, cool, and corrupt Santa!?

name: Y'golonac
text:
Oh well, for the good kids, Uncle will fulfill those
dark and bad wishes that you can't put into words!

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
This is... a Santa outfit suitable for a General Manager!
I never thought the day would come when I would turn to the 'side of Santa'...!!

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Hmph, from this moment until the end of Christmas,
you may call me— 'Santa Kumara'!!

name: Baphomet
text:
Ah, for me to wear such a holy outfit.
But if it makes these children happy...!

name: Baphomet
text:
Yes, then, I can surely act as Santa.
Perhaps, the amount of wishes may even exceed my previous record?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hihihi, it's a cool 'design' that suits a 'person' of Kabukicho, right?
[Player], that outfit also suits you well~!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sanat Kumara
dialogue_after_selection.text:
A fusion of the power of a General Manager, and the splendor of Christmas— A fine match.
Hmph, your outfit is also very like you, not bad.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
How embarrassing...
But my heart flutters at your words.
Your outfit is also very lovely, [Player]-sama.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Wait, even if it's the power of wishes,
aren't you practically Santa right now?
You, you seriously have a talent for being Santa.

options.text: This genie is just too easy to handle.

name: Triton
text:
Good grief, I never said that you have to go this far?
Hmph, as expected, it won't be tight enough without a teacher like me!

name: Triton
text:
But— for today, this is fine.
I'll overlook it, Jinn-sensei.

name: Jinn
text:
—Gahaha! How is it!?
What do you think of my big Christmas present to you!?

name: Color Gang
text:
Yay, it's the best!!
It's the Christmas of the Fighting Festival!!

The miracle of the 'pre-eve' and its brilliance enveloped the venue.
Hearing the voices of the frolicking children, the others also gathered.

name: Suzuka
text:
So is this... Jinn-sensei's doing?
Well, he's certainly got some style.

name: Ellie
text:
So it was worth putting some effort into the Tag Match.
Teacher looks happy surrounded by all those cuties... Lucky him.

name: Ame no Uzume
text:
Hey, Ellie, Suzuka, come take a pic together!
This is the best spot for some photos, for real~!!

Countless smiles emerged in the fantastic illumination.
The genie of smoke who brought that scene also deepened his smile with satisfaction—

And when the surroundings were tinged with silence,
[Player] found themselves taking a gentle walk through the night venue with Jinn.

name: Jinn
text:
Hehe, sorry for dragging you along with me.
You must've been busy with your police work.

name: Jinn
text:
Actually, I had a few drinks with Triton-sensei back at a stall.
I figured a stroll would help me sober up a bit, you know?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No, I just wanted to properly thank you.
This time, you and Jagannath really beat some sense back into me.

options.text: Drinking in front of students... no?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ugh, don't be such a buzzkill.
It was just a tiny bit, so please overlook it for today...
Consider it a victory toast, alright?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
—[Player], thank you again.
This time, you and Jagannath really beat some sense back into me.

options.text: Drinking right after exercise isn't good!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ugh, don't be such a buzzkill.
It was just a tiny bit, so please overlook it for today...
Consider it a victory toast, alright?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
—[Player], thank you again.
This time, you and Jagannath really beat some sense back into me.

name: Jinn
text:
The kids told me. I heard what you said to convince them.
It really means a lot that you thought of me that way.

name: Jinn
text:
I'm glad I came to this Tokyo,
and I'm glad I became a teacher.

name: Jinn
text:
For me— A teacher, nothing makes me happier than
seeing these kids smile, watching them changing themselves.

options.text: I knew you were a good teacher.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ugh... [Player], you really thought of me like that...!?
Having a student like you look up to me, I'm really the luckiest man alive...!!

options.text: I'm also happy to see you smile, Jinn-sensei.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Huh!? T-That's some really cheesy stuff...
There's nothing more to it... right?

options.text: What will you do for me in return?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Anything you want, of course.
...But nothing that goes against the public order and the genies' morals, alright!?

name: Jinn
text:
So... Uh... Are you still deadset
on becoming a police officer after all?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I-Is that so? I thought for sure...!
But, right. It's only been a few days.
Haha!

options.text: I might be quite attracted to it.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...I see. It certainly seems a good suit for you.
Especially if you're teaming up with Jagannath.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Right, I see. It's only been a few days.
It's something you should think about carefully from now on.

name: Jinn
text:
A-Anyway! Your future's your own call to make, so whatever you decide,
as your teacher, I'm gonna give you my full support.

name: Jinn
text:
—But... I don't know if 'just in case' is the right way to put it,
but could you let me clearly tell you once more?

name: Jinn
text:
[Player]. You are my important—
My irreplaceable, special student. So...

At that moment, his right shoulder— the part of 'Y'golonac's bite', throbbed suddenly.
At the same time, Jinn's own feelings swelled up, and he panicked.

name: Jinn
text:
...Oops, I almost ran wild again.
Dammit, what kind of 'teacher' acts like this!?

options.text: Tell me about your past, teach.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, it's not much of a fun story.
But if that's what you really want, I'll fulfill that wish.

options.text: I want to know everything about you.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
W-What do you mean by that...
Ah, exactly as it sounds, I-I see, sure.

He scratched his head with a wry smile and fell silent.
And, after much hesitation― he made up his mind to speak.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Sorry, but would you hear me talk a bit about myself first?
Otherwise, I'm sure you wouldn't understand what I'm trying to tell you.

name: Jinn
text:
...My hometown, 'Garodemann', is an archetypal world of binary oppositions.
A place where numbers are power, and hierarchy is decided by whoever has the majority.

name: Jinn
text:
And, for us, the desires of the masses are our source of strength.
Any surviving genies would be naturally born with such desires.

name: Jinn
text:
But, on the other hand... The most fundamental desire of a genie is—
It's not exactly well known, but it's to be strongly desired by one person.

name: Jinn
text:
In other words— Our true pleasure lies in forming something like a 'partnership contract',
and serving that someone with everything we've got.

A bit of hesitation was again present in his words.
Jinn continued with a tightened tone of voice.

name: Jinn
text:
...Genies often bargain with words.
But for some reason, I've never been the type for that kind of thing.

name: Jinn
text:
So, I'm gonna give it to you straight.
[Player], if you really wish for it—

Jinn leaned in significantly, but three seconds later,
he gave a hard slap to his own cheek.

name: Jinn
text:
—No, no, you idiot!!
What kind of teacher hits on his own student while he's drunk!?

name: Jinn
text:
Gaaaah! I'll talk about this when I can actually think straight!
But— what the hell's gotten into me!??

options.text: I want to hear the rest right now.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
A-All I can say right now is—
Anyway, just give me a bit of your time tonight!

options.text: I can become your master, teach!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
W-wait, don't tell me the festival mood is getting to you too!?
Those kinds of things are supposed to be done slowly, step by step...!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Anyway, all I can say right now is—
Just give me a bit of your time tonight!

options.text: Let's have Sarutahiko wash you completely later.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
A-All I can say right now is—
Anyway, just give me a bit of your time tonight!

name: Jinn
text:
After fulfilling a wish that big, surely divine
punishment won't fall if I were to make a modest wish myself!

name: Jinn
text:
Now that you're leaving Shinjuku,
I'm gonna be so damn lonely—!!

As a teacher, as a genie, and as a man.
He shouted his honest thoughts straight, even while being torn in a complex way.

options.text: Sure, I'll stay with you for a while.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Hehe, thank you.
I didn't think it would be so happy to have someone listen to my wish.

options.text: (Think he's cute and pat his head)
I want to hear your wish too, teach.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Hehe, thank you.
I didn't think it would be so happy to have someone listen to my wish.

text:
Is his cheek flushed because of the cold,
because of the tipsiness, or perhaps—

With the sparkles filling their own visions,
the two of them laughed to each other.

name: Jagannath
text:
God, why did you have to drag me out here?
I'm at the climax of both the festival and the investigation, you know?

name: Daikoku
text:
I'd prefer if you could keep your mouth shut, Jagannath-kun.
Now, Toji-kun. Provide the information you have obtained on site.

At Daikoku's prompting, which left no room for argument,
Toji showed hesitation for just a moment.

name: Toji
text:
...What Jagannath-senpai is doing might be
overstepping the boundaries of police jurisdiction, but—

name: Daikoku
text:
I'm not asking for your personal opinion.
Just briefly report on the investigation of the attack incident.

name: Toji
text:
There's... no need to even conduct an investigation.
Because, it is already clear who the culprit is.

name: Toji
text:
The entire festival is moving with the knowledge of that,
and you could even say it has become an open secret. But...

name: Daikoku
text:
—I see. In other words, 'a festival by anti-social
forces is sheltering delinquent boys', correct?

name: Daikoku
text:
The organizers went through countless negotiations with us just to secure the permit
for this festival, and now, they are ruining that opportunity with their own hands.

name: Daikoku
text:
And to make matters worse, a member of the
police is leading them in doing so— Isn't that right?

name: Toji
text:
...! Yes, while that is... a fact,
I believe it might be an one-sided view. Because—

name: Daikoku
text:
Oh, have you been influenced by Jagannath-kun?
I expected that you of all people would have
judged without drowning in personal sentiment.

After glancing sharply at Toji,
he turned his back, putting an end to the conversation.

name: Daikoku
text:
—As of tomorrow, we have decided to
raid the base of the color gang.

name: Toji
text: —Huh?

name: Daikoku
text:
A brawl already broke out on the first day, and it has come to this.
As upholders of the law, we can no longer overlook this.

name: Daikoku
text:
Besides, tomorrow is Christmas Eve. If we want the Santas to go about their work in peace,
we need to deliver some good news ahead of time, don't you think?

name: Daikoku
text:
I had originally intended to wait for your report, Toji-kun, but I've changed my mind―
Bringing them in on an unrelated charge will suffice just as well.

name: Toji
text:
W-Wait, please!
The boys are now under [Player] and the others—

name: Daikoku
text:
Student Toji Sakimori, I understand what it is that you wanted to say.
But, if everyone allowed themselves to be swept away by personal
sentiment, there would be no need for rulers.

name: Daikoku
text:
It's a role that someone must play.
Otherwise, how could anyone have faith in the law?

name: Daikoku
text:
This matter is settled. We will take the boys into protective custody.
Furthermore, I believe a separate chat with the festival organizers is in order.

Jagannath, who had remained silent, suddenly stepped forward.
He pulled an envelope from his jacket, and tossed it carelessly onto the table.

Daikoku looked down at that white envelope,
and slowly raised his face to look at his subordinate.

name: Daikoku
text:
...Hmm.
And this would be?

name: Jagannath
text:
It's my 'position'. —Wait until the festival is over.
Do that, and I won't have any objection to you taking the kids in.

name: Toji
text:
—No way.
Jagannath, you...!?

name: Jagannath
text:
Heh. You didn't think I'd come unprepared for this, did you?
When you spend your life coloring outside the lines of the law,
a day like this is bound to come sooner or later.

name: Jagannath
text:
This is the only way I can settle the score.
Rather, it's the only thing left I've got to offer.

name: Jagannath
text:
...Until this special festival is over.
That's all I'm asking. —Please.

Jagannath, who was about to leave without waiting for an answer,
stopped because his colleague called out to him.

name: Toji
text:
Do you really think they'll be happy if you offer your head?
What you're doing, that will surely just hurt them instead.

A long, heavy silence full of bitterness.
The delinquent cop responded with a slightly cracked voice.

name: Jagannath
text:
...Well, as long as you keep quiet, they won't ever find out.
Those kids are just a bunch of simple-minded idiots anyway.

name: Jagannath
text:
Heheh. So that's how it's gonna be.
Sorry, but I'm counting on you— Toji.

He raised a hand without looking back.
Then, the hard sound of the door closing echoed in the room—
